data.text:
1.	Check-in/Check-out: 4/5
Can be more efficient especially for HH lane. Other guests were attended to faster at times than HH lane.

2.	Rooms (cleanliness, amenities) 5/5
No comments, good, clean rooms.

3.	On-premise restaurants: 5/5
We really liked the BBQ restaurant on premises. Whoever made it work definitely lived in the States. From food to drinks to the atmosphere, it was a place we would definitely come back to.

4.	Pool area: 5/5
Very nice pool (There is a beach but with all the yachts and the boats you can literally see oil on the surface of the water).
You can also order drinks and food and it will be brought to you. Can stay here the whole day.

5.	Service: 5/5
This could have been 2 or 3 if it was not for one person at this hotel. Kudos to Assistant Manager Monica M. My wife and I had encountered a less than pleasant experience at the lounge upstairs which put a sour note one of the evenings. Neither the concierge on the shift nor the food and bev manager did anything when the situation was brought to their attention. When I spoke to Monica, however, I can certainly say that this Hilton is lucky to have her. She listened and listened and then put a cherry on top for our stay (which she did not have to). I was providing feedback not to get anything in return.
	
Note: The breakfast area does remind me of Brownian motion with everyone trying to navigate their way to whatever item. The layout is somewhat strange.

Overall weighted score: 4.96 out of 5.0

Would we come back? Yes
data.title: Good hotel, some room for improvement

data.text: Excellent hotel, clean, food good. The only negative was I had paid extra for club lounge access to he told at check in that under 18 were not permitted in the lounge for happy hr 5-7pm. I have a 13 yr old. We were told it was new rules. We asked for a refund on club lounge access and it was refused as we had already paid. I feel this was unfair as the rules had changed since booking as I would not have paid extra for club lounge access when booking. I feel we could have been offered vouchers to use at restaurants if no refund. The afternoon tea was also disappointing.
data.title: Dont pay extra for lounge access if you have children

data.text: This was our second time staying at this property while visiting Dubai.  Beautiful hotel with kind and very attentive staff. Hamad at the front desk answered all our questions and gave good recommendations to buy local garb and scents. Thanks
data.title: Another Good Stay

data.text:
A wonderful five night Easter break with my family! This was my first time staying at this hotel in Dubai and we will most certainly be returning! 

From start to finish, we have had a great experience. Room upgrade on arrival, staff who are incredibly helpful,  attentive and accommodating, a great selection of restaurants and bars - there is something for everyone! The rooms are also very comfortable.

At breakfast each morning we were served by a lovely guy (Gautham) who was always friendly and jolly. Nothing we asked was ever too much. He is a credit to the hotel along with all of the other staff members who made our stay memorable! 

Can’t wait to come back!
data.title: Fabulous!

user_location.name: Newcastle upon Tyne, Tyne and Wear, England

data.text:
It's a nice place in Dubai to spend time with friends and family very nice beach 
I didn't stay a long time but always my friends recommended me to stay here 
Thank you so much to the girl in reception Kuma and also thank you to Mira from the Restaurant.
data.title: Nice stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear fazahh2024, 
Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with us! Our team is dedicated to providing excellent service, and we are thrilled to hear we hit the mark. Your compliments will definitely be shared with our wonderful colleagues Kuma and Mira, who contributed to your positive experience. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon! Warm regards, 
Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Hilton Palm
